title: Leading brands on Facebook from Indonesia 2017 , by number of fans
yAxis: Number of fans on Facebook in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
The highest value at Month Mario Teguh is 2.44x times more than the lowest value at Liputan6.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of fans on Facebook in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
The highest value at Month Mario Teguh is 2.44x times more than the lowest value at Liputan6.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
Second maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions is found at Month DRAWING PENCIL.
The maximum Month Mario Teguh has got 2.44 times higher Number of fans on Facebook in millions than the minimum Month Liputan6.
Month Mario Teguh is higher than any other Months with value 19.99, followed by DRAWING PENCIL, and Kompas.com. Down to Month Liputan6 with the lowest value 8.19.
Overall Number of fans on Facebook in millions has reduced over the Months.
The Month Liputan6 has 1.88 times less Number of fans on Facebook in millions than average.
